dmca.title: [ABUSE] CEASE AND DESIST NOTICE
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 21, 2005 3:39 PM
To: webmaster@skamptr.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] CEASE AND DESIST NOTICE

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: SkamPTR Webmaster <webmaster@skamptr.com>
To: <webmaster@lolclicks.com>
Date: Monday, February 21, 2005, 3:15:53 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] CEASE AND DESIST NOTICE

===8<==============Original message text===============
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL
Publication of this email on any public website or forum will result in
prosecution.

To whom it may concern,

This is a cease and desist notice for Jose Silva, owner of lolclicks.com. He
has 48 hours to remove ALL reference of SkamPTR.com, and my name/nick from
his forum, including this post by 'mana' located here:

http://friends.lolclicks.com/viewtopic.php?t=99

Failure to do so will result in legal action being taken for civil damages
and will incurr a $50 per day fee for it's placement on there,
and could also result in possibly criminal prosecution for protection of a
hacker.

Your's sincerely,
G S Long





===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCGlT6vK/XpJs6oyURAirvAJ9wkoQltf1kTz3KnV54TmOt8vgCbwCffKa/
/b7jGQb2Y3oOZfLXyrAYwJo=
=EqPE
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
